jml.evolution.selections
Class Elitism

java.lang.Object
  jml.evolution.Operator
      jml.evolution.Selection
          jml.evolution.selections.Elitism

public class Elitism
extends Selection

Title: Elitism

Description: A elitist selection strategy. In this strategy the best individuals (Elite percentage) are always selected and the worst individuals (cull percentange) are never take into account. The remaining part of the individual is choosen randomly, and each individual has a probability to be choosen that is proportional to its fitness.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

Constructor: Create a Elitist selection strategy.

Parameters:
_environment - Environment of the Population
_n - Number of individuals to be choosen
_includeX - If the individual given in the apply method is going to be selected always or not
_elite_percentage - Percentage of individuals to be included in the selection
_cull_percentage - Percentage of individuals to be excluded in the selection
